alert.note: Alert for Morris; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 6:55PM EST until January 07 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Warren and Morris. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 6 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At lower elevations (less than 500 feet above sea-level), snowfall totals will be reduced.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
